snippet: The open-carry debate in Texas is the latest barometer of America’s firearm culture, as it veers somewhere between eerie and lethal.
abstract: Editorial observes that Texas may pass legislation that will allow gun owners to carry handguns openly as it is priority of Republican majority in State Legislature and of Gov-elect Greg Abbott; laments that debate in Texas over whether to allow open-carrying of handguns is barometer of where nation finds itself in gun debate, despite numerous deaths by firearms either by accident or by disturbed individuals.
lead_paragraph: The open-carry debate in Texas is the latest barometer of America’s firearm culture, as it veers somewhere between eerie and lethal.

headline.print_headline: Gun Rights, From Holsters to Bras
headline.main: Gun Rights, From Holsters to Bras
